title: TheLead123
author: TheLead123
created_time: May 13, 2022, 04:42:35 PMLast edit: January 08, 2023, 01:15:29 PM by TheLead123
content: Where Creativity Meets Technology!We specialize in developing websites for businesses and individuals. Our products include website design & development, e-commerce, and graphic design.What we can do for you?Services we provide for your business.Get a brief idea on the services we provide at Unikbrushes.1. Web Design2. E-commerce3. Front-end Web Development4. CMS Web Development (WordPress, Joomla, Drupal, etc)5. UI/UX Design6. Graphic Designs7. Photo Re-touching8. Video Editing9. PSD to HTML10. Figma to HTML11. Adobe xD to HTML12. Website Re-Designing13. React JS Development14. PHP Development15. Logo Designing16. Banner Designing17. Poster Designing18. Search Engine Optimization (SEO)19. Digital MarketingPortfolioOur Complete Portfolio.Check out our recent works in all the services. Click on the mockup images to view them in detail with screenshots and live link.           PricingAffordable PricingGet an approximate rate for all the services we provide at Unikbrushes. We also offer designs for premade scrips such as Evolution, Aurora, GoldCoders, MLM, Zeligz, Wordpress, and others.Why Choose us?Top reasons to choose UnikbrushesProviding web design and development solutions since 2016 with 100% customer satisfaction. We are an experienced team of enthusiastic designers and developers ready to serve the web.Quick DeliveryWe know that time is money. Therefore, we offer a fast turnaround time on all our projects without compromising on the quality of the designs.Professional WorkYour projects will be handled by our professional team to ensure you experience the best service with Unikbrushes.24/7 SupportSupport is very important for a successful business. That's why we support our customers quickly and easily to ensure their success.About usBrief introduction of ourselvesWe started off as a sole proprietorship company back in 2016. We were only providing web designs for certain platforms back then. After 2 years, we started providing graphic designs like logo designing, banner designing, poster designing, etc.2 years passed since then, we started providing PHP development and WordPress development with the help of a few team members. At present (2022), we are a fully fledged Web Design and Development Company in which you can get all the Web Application Development and Design services from us.StatisticsA quick statistics of our business6+Years of experience435+Websites designed6+Graphics designed250+Happy ClientsSo, what are you waiting for?Contact us by social media for even faster responses    Thank you & Best Regards,Unikbrushes Founder & CEOhttps://www.unikbrushes.com

comments.author: TheLead123
comments.created_time: May 14, 2022, 05:04:18 PMLast edit: September 23, 2022, 03:28:27 PM by TheLead123

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Finally someone with a clear portfolio. looks good, however, but I would like to get some explanations.First, your prices are quite low, I hope the quality is not low. what I can see from the pictures you show as your portfolio the menu looks like it was generated through some of the known web design software. I would say that they are not unique and that they are not entirely your work from scratch. I would love to see some of your work in actual use for a third client.of course, if you can make a solid and unique design from scratch, I could put you in bookmarks for some future jobs.

comments.author: TheLead123
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on May 15, 2022, 10:47:08 AMFinally someone with a clear portfolio. looks good, however, but I would like to get some explanations.First, your prices are quite low, I hope the quality is not low. what I can see from the pictures you show as your portfolio the menu looks like it was generated through some of the known web design software. I would say that they are not unique and that they are not entirely your work from scratch. I would love to see some of your work in actual use for a third client.of course, if you can make a solid and unique design from scratch, I could put you in bookmarks for some future jobs.Hello, Thank you for your reply.The prices are low because I'm still a newbie to this forum.Actually, I designed each and every template by myself. I can send you the HTML CSS codes of my previous works, so you can check them out.  And I have made few responsive designs also, using bootstrap.Also, I have my own web design portfolio: https://www.unikbrushes.com Please check it out. Please DM me your Skype ID. So I can send you the codes of my previous works. Thank you and best regards,Amar

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: TheLead123 on May 15, 2022, 10:57:39 AM~Also, I have my own web design portfolio: https://www.unikbrushes.com Although it is not a bad portfolio, it would be good if you made a few unique designs, since all of these look like free web templates that can be found on the Internet. Luckily, you're one of those Web designers who can create something functional and attractive, but for a small price, and that is  a good thing.But I suggest you try to get out of your comfort zone sometimes , make something that will cause a little bit of a stir and stimulate people to talk about it, so you're creating a buzz about yourself and your portfolio. Good luck to you. I wish you great success with your business.

comments.author: TheLead123
comments.body: Quote from: Stalker22 on May 15, 2022, 02:48:29 PMQuote from: TheLead123 on May 15, 2022, 10:57:39 AM~Also, I have my own web design portfolio: https://www.unikbrushes.com Although it is not a bad portfolio, it would be good if you made a few unique designs, since all of these look like free web templates that can be found on the Internet. Luckily, you're one of those Web designers who can create something functional and attractive, but for a small price, and that is  a good thing.But I suggest you try to get out of your comfort zone sometimes , make something that will cause a little bit of a stir and stimulate people to talk about it, so you're creating a buzz about yourself and your portfolio. Good luck to you. I wish you great success with your business.Thank you very much, I will appreciate your time which you have spent on checking out my portfolio. And yes, thanks for your suggestion. I will consider it. Basically I was doing 90% of my work for Paid To Click websites, that's the reasons it's looking like that. And of course I have designed many websites including traveling sites, hotel sites, etc. But was getting more orders for PTC designs.Best regards,Amar

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: TheLead123 on May 17, 2022, 04:52:11 AM@bumpAdded a new hotel design templateOh, you just added a template for a well-known fraud scheme, money doubler. I'd say that's not what we want to see here. a lot of energy is put into suppressing scams here and any promotion of such a business leads to negative feedback. even if you only offer software/design for it we don't like that.

comments.author: TheLead123
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on May 17, 2022, 10:09:50 AMQuote from: TheLead123 on May 17, 2022, 04:52:11 AM@bumpAdded a new hotel design templateOh, you just added a template for a well-known fraud scheme, money doubler. I'd say that's not what we want to see here. a lot of energy is put into suppressing scams here and any promotion of such a business leads to negative feedback. even if you only offer software/design for it we don't like that.Yep, doubler sites are always a fraud schemes. But I displayed the designs which I have made for the reference to the buyers. These designs are just a showcase of my works. So buyers can check out the designs and they can get to know my designing skills.  After completion of the design, I have no connection regarding the website fraud scheme. Anyway I have removed that doubler template, I don't want to get any misunderstanding from anyone for my designing services. Thank you very much for your suggestion. I appreciate your patience on checking my portfolio

comments.author: NFTdevelop
comments.body: Hello!Your pricing is real? O.oYou doing professional web design for $25-50? Or its just the design without code?Can you do NFT minting site?

comments.author: TheLead123
comments.body: Quote from: NFTdevelop on June 19, 2022, 06:56:20 PMHello!Your pricing is real? O.oYou doing professional web design for $25-50? Or its just the design without code?Can you do NFT minting site?Hello, firstly, thank you for your reply. Yeah the prices are real.No, I provide designs with codes, in HTML and CSS format.And yes, I can do any type of websites design. But never did a NFT minting site, but I can do it if you provide me details regarding the design.Thank you
